name: Mobile Information Exchange
overview:
MIXPE is a web-based lifeware utility service that allows you to exchange contacts, calendar events, tasks, notes, MIXPE messages, and internet bookmarks with anyone, anywhere, and at anytime from your internet connected mobile device, computer desktop, or a web browser.

MIXPE enabled devices will be able to dynamically, and securely synchronize your personal information between your mobile devices, home computer, and selectively with your office computer. You will even be able to access your contacts from a MIXPE enabled IP phone at your home or office.

Enjoy secure multi-media messaging, you can send encrypted text messages up to a whopping one-thousand characters from your mobile device or desktop. Send pictures, videos, even office files.

Your customers can request your companies contact or calendar event information directly from your website, social network, 411, or on-line listing service. Your information is sent straight to their mobile devices and puts your company right at their fingertips, literally just one click away from your customer and your next sale!, and it works for ANY business!
